casebody.data:
John WALKER III, in His Official Capacity as Chairman of the Board, et al., petitioners,
v.
TEXAS DIVISION, SONS OF CONFEDERATE VETERANS, INC., et al. No. 14-144. Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 5, 2014.

Opinion

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit granted.
